name: a bee in here!
description:
please play in fullscreen!

--

oh no! there's a bee trapped in your apartment. what are you going to do?!

and perhaps more importantly...

HOW IS THIS BEE IN HERE?!

--

a bee in here! is based on a true story, and it was very stressful. this game is part of muiniljams, my personal project to publish one short game a month over the summer of 2015. a bee in here! is game #2 (the first game after i returned from a long vacation!).

you can also play on philome.la here!
